name: amateurishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows a lack of skill: The email contained a short, amateurishly shot video of the race. The play was poorly acted and amateurishly directed. See
amateurish
More examplesFewer examplesWe tried the new restaurant and, sadly, the food was amateurishly prepared.He dabbled amateurishly in painting and enjoyed doing so. The novel seemed to be extremely amateurishly written.
